sql_mapping.insert: insert into mact_action (name, created_date, modified_date) values ('#name#', '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
sql_mapping.update: update mact_action set name='#name#', modified_date='#modified_date#' where action_id=#action_id#
sql_mapping.select: select * from mact_action where action_id in (#action_ids#)
select count(action_id) total from mact_action where #conditions#
